Title: A Fish Tale
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Sci-Fi
Director: Stefan Fjeldmark, Greg Manwaring, Michael Donovan, Michael Hegner
Writer: Tracy J. Brown (additional dialogue and scenario), Stefan Fjeldmark (original story), Stefan Fjeldmark (screenplay), Karsten Kiilerich (original story), Karsten Kiilerich (screenplay), John Stefan Olsen (screenplay)
Actors: Nis Bank-Mikkelsen, Søren Sætter-Lassen, Morten Kerrn Nielsen, Sebastian Jessen
Plot: Three children accidentally get turned into fish after drinking a potion made by an eccentric scientist. The kids end up in the sea, with one problem. They must find and drink the antidote within 48 hours, or forever remain as fish.
Country: Germany, Ireland, Denmark, USA, France, Canada, UK, Spain, Estonia, Latvia
